The Great Pyramid of Giza.name: The Great Pyramid of Giza
The Great Pyramid of Giza.description: The last remaining wonder of the ancient world, the Great Pyramid of Giza is a symbol of Egyptâ€™s rich history.

The Sphinx of Giza.name: The Sphinx of Giza
The Sphinx of Giza.description: The Great Sphinx of Giza, a limestone statue with a lion's body and a human head, guards the Pyramids of Giza.

Karnak Temple.name: Karnak Temple
Karnak Temple.description: Karnak Temple is one of the largest religious buildings ever constructed, dedicated to the Theban triad.

Valley of the Kings.name: Valley of the Kings
Valley of the Kings.description: The Valley of the Kings is the ancient burial ground of many of Egypt's New Kingdom pharaohs.

Abu Simbel Temples.name: Abu Simbel Temples
Abu Simbel Temples.description: The Abu Simbel temples are two massive rock temples originally carved out of a mountainside during the reign of Pharaoh Ramesses II.

Egyptian Museum.name: Egyptian Museum
Egyptian Museum.description: The Egyptian Museum in Cairo contains the world's most extensive collection of pharaonic antiquities.

Citadel of Qaitbay.name: Citadel of Qaitbay
Citadel of Qaitbay.description: The Citadel of Qaitbay is a 15th-century defensive fortress located on the Mediterranean sea coast in Alexandria.

Philae Temple.name: Philae Temple
Philae Temple.description: The Philae Temple complex, located on Agilkia Island, is one of Nubia's most important monument sites.

Cairo Tower.name: Cairo Tower
Cairo Tower.description: Cairo Tower, located in Zamalek, offers panoramic views of Cairo from its observation deck.

Al-Azhar Mosque.name: Al-Azhar Mosque
Al-Azhar Mosque.description: Al-Azhar Mosque is one of the most iconic and historic mosques in Cairo, founded in 970 AD.

Library of Alexandria.name: Library of Alexandria
Library of Alexandria.description: The modern Library of Alexandria is a major library and cultural center located on the shore of the Mediterranean Sea.

Unfinished Obelisk.name: Unfinished Obelisk
Unfinished Obelisk.description: The Unfinished Obelisk is the largest known ancient obelisk and a testament to the stone-working skills of the ancient Egyptians.

The Hanging Church.name: The Hanging Church
The Hanging Church.description: The Hanging Church is one of the oldest churches in Egypt and is suspended above a gatehouse of the Babylon Fortress.

Luxor Temple.name: Luxor Temple
Luxor Temple.description: Luxor Temple is a large Ancient Egyptian temple complex located on the east bank of the Nile River in the city of Luxor.
